properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 07 MAY BY
   M/V BGP CHALLENGER AND M/V SEA MOBY DICK
   TOWING 12000 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   03-03.26N 045-49.49W, 02-10.46N 047-20.22W,
   03-59.57N 046-04.37W
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1042/16.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 08 MAY 16.
